resources.string: Please sign in to enjoy the AppDoc experience!
Password must be longer than 6 characters
Password does not match password on file. Try Again.
Unable to reach server. Please check internet connection and try again.
Before you begin the colour test, here are some important instructions:

1. Hold your device about a foot away from your eyes. 
2. Make sure you are in a mild lightning environment, without any glare. 
3. Try to Identify the number or colour line on the plate within a few seconds. Select the best option from the buttons displayed at the bottom of the screen. Note: if you see nothing or the answer you think is correct is not displayed tap the “Nothing” button. In a few cases it is the correct answer. 
4. After tapping on one of the answers a next button will appear, it will take you to the next plate. 
5. Once you have completed the test, we will provide you with your score and some next steps. 
6. If you are satisfied with the app please share it!
What colour line do you see?

We think you may be red-green colour deficient. To undergo a more accurate test, make an appointment with an optometrist. If you currently don\'t have one click below to find an optometrist near you."
Your test revealed that you may be colorblind. To undergo a more accurate test, make an appointment with an optometrist. If you currently don\'t have one click below to find an optometrist near you.

Our test shows that you are not color blind. Although, it never hurts to get a second opinion. To undergo a more accurate test, make an appointment with an optometrist. If you currently don\'t have one click below to find an optometrist near you.
Before you begin the hearing test, here are some important instructions:

1. Click "Play" to play the audio file.
2. If you hear the audio, select "Yes" which will appear once the audio is played. If you do not, select "No".
3. Feel free to select "Stop" at any time while the audio is being played.
5. Once you have completed the test, we will provide you with your score and some next steps.
6. If you are satisfied with the app please share it!

NOTICE: The test has set your volume to the recommended 100%. If you wish to alter your volume you may do so. The minimum recommended volume is 75%.
Before you begin the eye test, here are some important instructions:

1. Start this test by covering your left eye. We will inform you when you should switch to your right eye.
2. This test works by rotating the letter "E", your job is to determine which way it is pointing by selecting the correct arrow button.
3. Once you tap an arrow button another letter will load.
4. Once you are finished we will show you your results.
5. If you are satisfied with the app please share it!
To start, make sure your left eye is covered. Now hold your phone out as far as you can and choose the arrow button that matches what way the \"E\" is pointed.
Nice work! Now cover your right eye.
Your eyes look excellent as far as we can tell. But, it never hurts to get an opinion from a trained professional. Click below to find an optometrist near you.
You did well on the test, but not perfect. We recommend that you visit an optometrist near you.
Your eyes seem to be OK, but they could be much better with corrective lenses. Click below to find an optometrist near you.
Your results are not great. We think it would be best if you made an appointment with a trained professional as soon as possible. Click below to find an optometrist near you.
Unfortunately you failed our test. We think it would be best if you made an appointment with a trained professional immediately. Click below to find an optometrist near you.
